testCases.name: Functional Application Test
testCases.description: Verify the application has actual real estate functionality beyond basic placeholder content
steps: Verify multiple interactive elements exist (search bar, property cards, navigation menu)
Check for proper navigation structure with links to Search, Dashboard, Login
Verify property listings are displayed with images, prices, and details
Confirm application shows real estate features, not just 'Vite + React' placeholder text
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application displays a functional real estate platform with property listings, search capabilities, and interactive navigation
testCases.failureCondition: If page only shows 'Vite + React' placeholder or lacks property listing functionality, this test FAILS

testCases.name: Landing Page Content Test
testCases.description: Verify landing page displays property listings and search functionality
steps: Check for hero section with search functionality
Verify featured properties section displays property cards
Confirm each property card shows: image, title, price, location, bedrooms, bathrooms
Check for 'View Details' or similar call-to-action buttons
testCases.expectedOutcome: Landing page displays professional real estate content with search and featured properties

testCases.name: User Registration Test
testCases.description: Test user registration flow with valid data
steps: Fill in registration form: email, password, full name, phone (optional)
Verify user is redirected to dashboard or prompted to verify email
testCases.expectedOutcome: User successfully registers and receives authentication token

testCases.name: User Login Test
testCases.description: Test user login with valid credentials
testCases.expectedOutcome: User successfully logs in and is redirected to dashboard with valid session

testCases.name: Agent Login Test
testCases.description: Test agent login with approved agent credentials
testCases.expectedOutcome: Approved agent successfully logs in and accesses agent dashboard

testCases.name: Agent Registration Requires Approval
testCases.description: Verify agent registration creates account but requires admin approval before login
steps: Fill in required agent information (email, password, license info, agency details)
Verify success message indicates approval is pending
Attempt to login with new agent credentials
Verify login is blocked with 'approval pending' message
testCases.expectedOutcome: Agent account is created but login is blocked until admin approves

testCases.name: Invalid Login Credentials Test
testCases.description: Verify proper error handling for invalid login credentials
steps: Verify error message is displayed: 'Invalid email or password'
Verify user is not logged in
testCases.expectedOutcome: Login fails with appropriate error message, no session created

testCases.name: Logout Test
testCases.description: Verify user can successfully logout
steps: Verify redirect to homepage or login page
testCases.expectedOutcome: User is logged out and cannot access protected routes

testCases.name: Password Reset Flow
testCases.description: Test forgot password and reset password functionality
steps: Verify success message indicating email was sent
Check email_logs table for password_reset entry
Navigate to reset password page with token
testCases.expectedOutcome: Password reset flow completes successfully and user can login with new password

testCases.name: Basic Property Search Test
testCases.description: Verify basic property search functionality works
steps: Navigate to search page or use search bar on homepage
Perform a search without any filters
Confirm results show property cards with essential information
Verify pagination works if more than 20 results
testCases.expectedOutcome: Search returns active properties with proper pagination

testCases.name: Property Search with Filters Test
testCases.description: Test property search with multiple filters applied
steps: Apply filters: listing_type=sale, property_type=house, min_price=1000000, max_price=5000000
Apply location filter: city=San Francisco, state=CA
Verify all returned properties are houses for sale in San Francisco with 3+ bedrooms
testCases.expectedOutcome: Search returns only properties matching all applied filters

testCases.name: Search Sorting Test
testCases.description: Verify search results can be sorted by different criteria
steps: Verify results are sorted from lowest to highest price
Verify results are sorted from highest to lowest price
Verify results show newest properties first
testCases.expectedOutcome: Search results properly sort based on selected criteria

testCases.name: Featured Properties Display
testCases.description: Verify featured properties are displayed prominently
preconditions: At least one property must be marked as featured
steps: Confirm featured properties have special styling or badge
Filter search for featured properties only (is_featured=true)
Verify only featured properties are returned
testCases.expectedOutcome: Featured properties are properly displayed and filterable

testCases.name: Property Detail View Test
testCases.description: Verify property detail page displays all property information
steps: Click on a property card to view details
Verify property detail page displays: title, price, address, bedrooms, bathrooms, square footage
Verify amenities and features list is displayed
Verify agent information is shown (name, agency, contact button)
Verify 'Contact Agent' or inquiry form is available
testCases.expectedOutcome: Property detail page displays comprehensive property information

testCases.name: Property Photo Gallery Test
testCases.description: Verify property photo gallery functionality
steps: Verify primary photo is displayed prominently
Verify thumbnail gallery of additional photos
Click on thumbnails to change main image
testCases.expectedOutcome: Photo gallery displays all property images with smooth navigation

testCases.name: Submit Property Inquiry as Guest
testCases.description: Test submitting an inquiry without being logged in
steps: Fill out inquiry form with: name, email, phone, message
Optionally request viewing with date and time
Verify inquiry is created in database
testCases.expectedOutcome: Guest can submit inquiry and agent is notified

testData.message: I am interested in viewing this property

testCases.name: Submit Property Inquiry as Logged-in User
testCases.description: Test submitting an inquiry while logged in
steps: Verify inquiry form is pre-filled with user information
Verify inquiry appears in 'My Inquiries' section
testCases.expectedOutcome: Logged-in user can submit inquiry with pre-filled data and track it in dashboard

testCases.name: Add Property to Favorites
testCases.description: Test adding a property to user favorites
steps: Click 'Add to Favorites' or heart icon
Verify visual feedback (heart icon fills, success message)
Navigate to 'Saved Properties' page in user dashboard
Verify property appears in favorites list
testCases.expectedOutcome: Property is successfully added to user's favorites and appears in saved properties

testCases.name: Remove Property from Favorites
testCases.description: Test removing a property from favorites
steps: Login as user with existing favorites
Click 'Remove' or unfilled heart icon on a property
Verify property is removed from list
Verify favorite icon is no longer filled
testCases.expectedOutcome: Property is successfully removed from favorites

testCases.name: Favorites Require Authentication
testCases.description: Verify favorites feature requires user to be logged in
steps: Attempt to click 'Add to Favorites' button
Verify user is prompted to login or redirected to login page
Verify favorite is not added without authentication
testCases.expectedOutcome: Unauthenticated users cannot add favorites and are prompted to login

testCases.name: Agent Create Listing Test
testCases.description: Test agent creating a new property listing
preconditions: Agent must be logged in and approved
steps: Fill in required property information: title, description, listing type, property type, price, address, bedrooms, bathrooms, square footage
Verify listing appears in agent's listings page
testCases.expectedOutcome: Agent successfully creates new property listing

property_data.title: Test Property Listing
property_data.description: This is a test property created for testing purposes with sufficient description length.

testCases.name: Agent View Inquiries Test
testCases.description: Verify agent can view and respond to property inquiries
preconditions: Agent must have properties with inquiries
steps: Navigate to 'Inquiries' page in agent dashboard
Verify list of inquiries is displayed
Verify each inquiry shows: property, inquirer name, message, date, status
Click on an inquiry to view details
Verify option to reply to inquiry
Verify option to mark inquiry status (responded, scheduled, completed)
testCases.expectedOutcome: Agent can view all inquiries and access reply functionality

testCases.name: Agent Edit Listing Test
testCases.description: Verify agent can edit their own property listings
preconditions: Agent must have at least one listing
steps: Modify property details (e.g., change price, update description)
Verify changes are reflected on property detail page
testCases.expectedOutcome: Agent successfully edits listing and changes are saved

testCases.name: Agent Cannot Edit Other Agent's Listings
testCases.description: Verify agents can only edit their own listings
steps: Attempt to access edit page for property owned by agent_002
Verify access is denied (403 Forbidden or redirect)
testCases.expectedOutcome: Agent cannot edit properties owned by other agents

testCases.name: Agent Dashboard Analytics Test
testCases.description: Verify agent dashboard displays analytics and statistics
preconditions: Agent must be logged in with active listings
steps: Verify dashboard displays: total views, total inquiries, total favorites
Verify active listings count is shown
Verify recent activity or inquiries are displayed
Check if performance charts/graphs are shown
testCases.expectedOutcome: Agent dashboard displays relevant analytics and performance metrics

testCases.name: Admin View Agent Approvals
testCases.description: Verify admin can view pending agent registrations
steps: Verify list of pending agent registrations is displayed
Verify each entry shows: agent name, email, license info, registration date
Verify filter/sort options for pending, approved, rejected
testCases.expectedOutcome: Admin can view all agent registration requests

testCases.name: Admin Approve Agent Test
testCases.description: Test admin approving an agent registration
steps: Verify approval notification is sent (check email_logs)
testCases.expectedOutcome: Admin successfully approves agent and agent can login

testCases.name: Admin Reject Agent Test
testCases.description: Test admin rejecting an agent registration with reason
testCases.expectedOutcome: Admin successfully rejects agent with reason provided

testCases.name: Admin Manage Featured Listings
testCases.description: Verify admin can feature/unfeature properties
steps: View list of all active properties
Set featured status, expiration date, and display order
Verify property appears in featured section on homepage
Verify feature badge is displayed on property
testCases.expectedOutcome: Admin successfully features property with custom settings

testCases.name: Admin Review Reported Listings
testCases.description: Verify admin can review and resolve property reports
steps: Verify list of property reports is displayed
Verify each report shows: property, reporter, reason, details, date
Click on a report to view details
Verify options to: resolve, dismiss, take action
testCases.expectedOutcome: Admin can review, investigate, and resolve property reports

testCases.name: UI Components Test
testCases.description: Verify UI components are properly implemented and functional
steps: Navigate through main pages (home, search, login, register)
Verify buttons are clickable and styled consistently
Check forms have proper input fields with labels
Verify navigation menu exists with proper links
Test dropdown menus and modals work correctly
testCases.expectedOutcome: All UI components are functional with consistent styling

testCases.name: Responsive Design Test
testCases.description: Verify application is responsive across different screen sizes
steps: Verify layout is proper with all elements visible
Verify property grid adjusts to fewer columns
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application adapts properly to all screen sizes

testCases.name: Navigation Test
testCases.description: Verify all navigation links work correctly
steps: Check header navigation links: Home, Search, About, Contact
Verify user menu shows: Dashboard, Saved Properties, Inquiries, Account, Logout (when logged in)
Verify agent menu shows: Dashboard, Listings, Inquiries, Profile, Settings (for agents)
Verify admin menu shows: Dashboard, Agent Approvals, Featured Listings, Reports (for admins)
Click each link and verify navigation works
Verify footer links work: Privacy, Terms, Contact
testCases.expectedOutcome: All navigation links function correctly and lead to appropriate pages

testCases.name: Form Validation - Registration
testCases.description: Test form validation on registration form
steps: Verify error messages appear for required fields
testCases.expectedOutcome: Form validation prevents invalid submissions with clear error messages

invalid_cases.expected_error: Password must be at least 8 characters

testCases.name: Property Search Input Validation
testCases.description: Test validation on property search filters
steps: Enter non-numeric values in numeric fields
testCases.expectedOutcome: Search form validates input and prevents invalid searches

testCases.name: Property Listing Creation Validation
testCases.description: Test validation when agent creates property listing
steps: Attempt to submit with required fields empty
Verify validation errors for: title, description, price, address, bedrooms, bathrooms, square_footage
Enter description shorter than minimum length (50 characters)
Enter negative price or square footage
testCases.expectedOutcome: Property creation form enforces all validation rules from Zod schema

testCases.name: 404 Page Not Found Test
testCases.description: Verify 404 page displays for invalid routes
steps: Verify link to return home is provided
testCases.expectedOutcome: 404 page displays with navigation back to valid pages

testCases.name: API Error Handling Test
testCases.description: Verify proper handling of API errors
steps: Verify appropriate error messages display to user
Verify 403 Forbidden shows access denied message
Verify 404 Not Found shows resource not found message
Verify 500 Server Error shows generic error message
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application handles all API errors gracefully with user-friendly messages

testCases.name: Network Error Handling
testCases.description: Test behavior when network connection is lost
steps: Attempt actions that require API calls
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application handles network errors gracefully and recovers when connection restored

testCases.name: Page Load Performance Test
testCases.description: Verify pages load within acceptable time
steps: Verify load time is under 3 seconds
Measure search results page load time
Measure property detail page load time
Verify detail page loads within 2 seconds
testCases.expectedOutcome: All pages load within acceptable performance thresholds

testCases.name: Search Performance Test
testCases.description: Verify property search returns results quickly
steps: Verify filtered results return within 1.5 seconds
testCases.expectedOutcome: Search queries execute efficiently with fast response times

testCases.name: Image Loading Optimization
testCases.description: Verify property images are optimized and load efficiently
steps: Check if lazy loading is implemented
Verify thumbnail images are smaller file sizes
Verify gallery images load on demand
testCases.expectedOutcome: Images are optimized and load efficiently without blocking page render

testCases.name: SQL Injection Prevention Test
testCases.description: Verify application is protected against SQL injection
steps: Enter SQL injection attempt in search field: ' OR '1'='1
Verify proper error handling or safe results
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application properly sanitizes inputs and prevents SQL injection attacks
testCases.security_note: PostgreSQL parameterized queries should prevent injection

testCases.name: XSS Prevention Test
testCases.description: Verify application prevents cross-site scripting attacks
steps: Attempt to submit inquiry with script tag: <script>alert('XSS')</script>
Test in other user input fields (property description, comments)
testCases.expectedOutcome: All user inputs are properly escaped and XSS attacks are prevented

testCases.name: Authentication Token Security
testCases.description: Verify JWT tokens are properly secured
steps: Verify token has appropriate expiration time
Verify access is denied with expired token
Test token is invalidated on logout
testCases.expectedOutcome: JWT tokens are properly validated and secured

testCases.name: CORS Configuration Test
testCases.description: Verify CORS is properly configured
steps: Check API response headers for CORS configuration
Test API requests from allowed origins succeed
Test API requests from unauthorized origins are blocked (if applicable)
testCases.expectedOutcome: CORS is properly configured for security while allowing legitimate requests

testCases.name: Property View Count Tracking
testCases.description: Verify property views are tracked correctly
steps: Note initial view count for property (prop_001)
Verify view tracking behavior (increment each time or deduplicate by session)
Check property_views table for logged views
testCases.expectedOutcome: Property views are accurately tracked and stored

testCases.name: Inquiry Count Tracking
testCases.description: Verify inquiry count increments when inquiry is submitted
steps: Submit an inquiry about the property
Check inquiries table for new entry
Verify property inquiry count matches actual inquiry records
testCases.expectedOutcome: Inquiry counts are accurately maintained

testCases.name: Favorite Count Synchronization
testCases.description: Verify favorite count stays synchronized with favorites table
steps: Verify count matches actual favorite records in favorites table
testCases.expectedOutcome: Favorite counts remain accurate and synchronized

test_execution_notes.test_users: See test_users.json for valid login credentials
test_execution_notes.test_order: Execute in order: Functionality → Authentication → Search → CRUD → Role-Based → Validation → Error Handling → Performance → Security
test_execution_notes.critical_tests: Tests marked as 'critical' priority must pass for application to be considered functional
test_execution_notes.automation: These test cases can be automated using tools like Cypress, Playwright, or Selenium
test_execution_notes.api_testing: API endpoints can be tested directly using Postman, curl, or automated API testing tools
